item.title: Envoy Lua Filter Exploration - Part 1
item.description: Envoy offers a lot of variety in HTTP filters and you can do a lot with what comes out of the box like Header Mutation filter or gRPC-HTTP Transcoding. While this is great, there are certain circumstances where we need some additional customizations so Envoy scratches this itch by providing options like Lua Filter, Wasm Filter or the ExtProc Filter. To start my journey into extending Envoy, I spent some time looking into the Lua HTTP Filter.
